author: gcolvin
content: Thanks for the new spec!  I'll make my usual request that we get an actual Meta EIP soon.  The lack of one makes EOF seem more complicated, more difficult to implement (especially the validation)  and less useful than it is.  The result is more pushback on getting it into upgrade than I'd like to see.  I once hoped to see dynamic jumps die while I was still doing active development.  Now I want to see them die before I do ðŸ˜¦

author: chfast
content: To explain this, we are migrating to GitHub to be able to do proper reviews of changes. PRs are welcome.

author: phucthai
content: not sure if someone has asked this before but if in the future, some EVM chain wants to have EOF but cannot use the magic 0xEF00 (e.g., someone deployed a contract started with 0xEF00), will the compilers support custom the EOF magic?
